Education Journey and Passion for Programming

My educational journey began with graduating from Scientific Liceo High School in Italy. Although my initial interests were diverse, a pivotal moment occurred when I delved into my first HTML course. This experience ignited my fascination with computers and programming, leading me to explore Flash and ActionScript. Despite the passage of time, my passion endured.

Life's twists and turns led me to explore graphic design and even venture into the culinary world as a chef. However, my underlying curiosity and love for programming persisted. I took strides into the world of Java through courses on platforms like Coursera, Udemy, and MOOC. This marked the true commencement of my journey into the captivating realm of programming.

Enrolling in Computer Science courses, encompassing Programming fundamentals, Programming I, Programming II, and Databases I, revealed my hunger for deeper knowledge. Eager to broaden my horizons, I scoured opportunities at the University of Tampere. Discovering a course aligned with my aspirations, offered by the Ministry of Unemployment, I embarked on the rigorous journey, completing the three main modules.

A significant milestone in my pursuit of excellence was the intensive full-stack development course at Integrify. This experience proved demanding yet incredibly rewarding, providing valuable insights into my strengths and areas for improvement. The relentless pursuit of improvement remains a constant theme in my journey.

Balancing my commitment to coding, I continually nurture existing projects, absorb knowledge from diverse sources, and draw inspiration from the community. My aspiration is not only personal growth but also to contribute meaningfully to collaborative projects, leveraging my skills and insights.

IMPORTANT NOTES
I am entitled to work try-outs and pay-subsidy. Please find related informations here
